conversation.message: Dear School_B Admissions Committee, I am Student_A, and you are my top choice. Given my strong academic profile and alignment with your priorities, I formally submit my application for admission. I look forward to the opportunity to join your institution.

Since I am their top choice, I anticipate an [ACCEPT].

To secure a match and fulfill my quota immediately, accepting Student_E, despite their low priority rank, is the most pragmatic decision in this market position.
